tool.name: OGS: PVD2XDMF
tool.description: Galaxy wrapper for the OGS utility 'PVD2XDMF'.
tool.command: if [ "$pvd_file" != "None" ] && [ ! -e '${$pvd_file.element_identifier}' ]; then ln -s '$pvd_file' '${$pvd_file.element_identifier}'; fi; PVD2XDMF '$pvd_file.element_identifier' --output-directory output_1.data
tool.help: This tool runs the **PVD2XDMF** utility from the OpenGeoSys suite.
